title: GSK : revenue of Seretide/Advair globally by region 2012 to 2018
summary: You are viewing a chart of multi-line type with 5 lines denoting Total, United States, Europe, Emerging markets, and Rest of world. The y axis indicates the Revenue in million British pounds and the x axis indicates Year.
Overall Total, United States, Europe, and Emerging markets are gradually decreasing, Rest of world is roughly constant,  throughout the Year
Overall across the Year, Total mostly maintained the highest Revenue in million British pounds when compared to others with a mean value of 3895.29, and it peaked at 2013.
After Total, United States overall has the second highest values , with a mean value of 1953.6, peaking at 2013.
Emerging markets mostly had the least Revenue in million British pounds with a mean value of 178.0, which peaked at 2013 with a value of 429.0.
